scripts.books-post: docker cp app_api/models/test-data-books.json bookstor-fri-mongodb:/test-data-books.json; docker exec -it bookstor-fri-mongodb mongoimport --db BookStor --collection Books --mode upsert --upsertFields title --jsonArray --file test-data-books.json; docker exec -it bookstor-fri-mongodb rm -rf test-data-books.json
scripts.users-post: docker cp app_api/models/test-data-users.json bookstor-fri-mongodb:/test-data-users.json; docker exec -it bookstor-fri-mongodb mongoimport --db BookStor --collection Users --mode upsert --upsertFields name --jsonArray --file test-data-users.json; docker exec -it bookstor-fri-mongodb rm -rf test-data-users.json; docker exec -it bookstor-fri-mongodb bash -c \\\"mongosh BookStor --eval 'db.Users.find().forEach(function(dokument) { for (var i = 0; i < dokument.alreadyRanked.length; i++) { dokument.alreadyRanked[i]._id = ObjectId() } db.Users.replaceOne({ \\\"_id\\\" : dokument._id }, dokument) })'\\\"; docker exec -it bookstor-fri-mongodb bash -c \\\\\\\"mongosh BookStor --eval 'db.Users.find().forEach(function(dokument) { for (var i = 0; i < dokument.comments.length; i++) { dokument.comments[i]._id = ObjectId() } db.Users.replaceOne({ \\\\\\\"_id\\\\\\\" : dokument._id }, dokument) })'\\\\\\\"; docker exec -it bookstor-fri-mongodb bash -c \\\\\\\"mongosh BookStor --eval 'db.Users.find().forEach(function(dokument) { for (var i = 0; i < dokument.myBooks.length; i++) { dokument.myBooks[i]._id = ObjectId() } db.Users.replaceOne({ \\\\\\\"_id\\\\\\\" : dokument._id }, dokument) })'\\\\\\\"
scripts.books-export-production: docker exec -it bookstor-fri-mongodb bash -c "mongodump -h localhost -d BookStor -o ./"; docker exec -it bookstor-fri-mongodb bash -c "mongorestore --drop --uri mongodb+srv://app:Bo0kStoRd4tABas3@bookstordb.lj2u3.mongodb.net ./BookStor/Books.bson"; docker exec -it bookstor-fri-mongodb bash -c "rm -rf ./BookStor"
scripts.users-export-production: docker exec -it bookstor-fri-mongodb bash -c "mongodump -h localhost -d BookStor -o ./"; docker exec -it bookstor-fri-mongodb bash -c "mongorestore --drop --uri mongodb+srv://app:Bo0kStoRd4tABas3@bookstordb.lj2u3.mongodb.net ./BookStor/Users.bson"; docker exec -it bookstor-fri-mongodb bash -c "rm -rf ./BookStor"
